name.description: Give a name to this configuration so it can be later referenced by config-ref.
name.caption: Name
name.name: name

string.description: The identifier for the Repository that this connector instance works with.
string.caption: Repository Id
string.name: repositoryId

string.description: URL base for the SOAP connector.
string.caption: Base Url
string.name: baseUrl

cloud-connector.description: CMIS (Content Management Interoperability Services) is a standard for improving interoperability between ECM systems.
cloud-connector.caption: CMIS

globalRef.description: Specify which configuration to use for this invocation.
globalRef.caption: Config Reference
globalRef.name: config-ref

string.description: The change log token to start from or.
string.caption: Change Log Token
string.name: changeLogToken

boolean.description: Indicates if changed properties should be included in the result.
boolean.caption: Include Properties
boolean.name: includeProperties

string.description: The object id.
string.caption: Object Id
string.name: objectId

string.description: Path of the object to retrieve.
string.caption: Path
string.name: path

string.description: Name of the file.
string.caption: Filename
string.name: filename

string.description: Folder in the repository that will hold the document.
string.caption: Folder Path
string.name: folderPath

enum.caption: Mime type
enum.description: The mime type, e.g. text/plain or application/json
enum.name: mimeType

string.description: The type of the object.
string.caption: Object Type
string.name: objectType

enum.description: An enumeration specifying what the versioing state of the newly-created object MUST be. If the repository does not support versioning, the repository MUST ignore the versioningState parameter.
enum.caption: Versioning State
enum.name: versioningState

boolean.description: If should folder structure must be created when there are missing intermediate folders.
boolean.caption: Force
boolean.name: force

childElement.description: The properties optional document properties to set.
childElement.caption: Properties
childElement.name: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/cmis/create-document-by-path-properties

string.description: Name of the file.
string.caption: Filename
string.name: filename

string.caption: Folder Id
string.name: folderId

enum.caption: Mime type
enum.description: The mime type, e.g. text/plain or application/json
enum.name: mimeType

string.description: The type of the object.
string.caption: Object Type
string.name: objectType

enum.description: An enumeration specifying what the versioing state of the newly-created object MUST be. If the repository does not support versioning, the repository MUST ignore the versioningState parameter.
enum.caption: Versioning State
enum.name: versioningState

childElement.description: The properties optional document properties to set.
childElement.caption: Properties
childElement.name: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/cmis/create-document-by-id-properties

string.description: Folder name (eg: "my documents").
string.caption: Folder Name
string.name: folderName

string.description: Parent folder for the folder being created (eg: repository.rootFolder).
string.caption: Parent Object Id
string.name: parentObjectId

string.description: Object type Id.
string.caption: Type Id
string.name: typeId

string.description: Comma-separated list of properties to filter.
string.caption: Filter
string.name: filter

string.description: Comma-separated list of query names and the ascending modifier "ASC" or the descending modifier "DESC" for each query name.
string.caption: Order By
string.name: orderBy

string.description: The query statement (CMIS query language).
string.caption: Statement
string.name: statement

string.description: Comma-separated list of properties to filter.
string.caption: Filter
string.name: filter

string.description: Comma-separated list of query names and the ascending modifier "ASC" or the descending modifier "DESC" for each query name.
string.caption: Order By
string.name: orderBy

boolean.description: Specifies if the latest and non-latest versions of document objects should be included.
boolean.caption: Search All Versions
boolean.name: searchAllVersions

string.description: The object whose parent folders are needed. can be null if "objectId" is set.
string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.name: cmisObject-ref

string.description: Id of the object whose parent folders are needed. can be null if "object" is set.
string.caption: Object Id
string.name: objectId

enum.description: NavigationOptions that specifies whether to get the parent folder, the list of immediate children or the whole descendants tree.
enum.caption: Get
enum.name: get

string.description: Folder Object. Can be null if "folderId" is set.
string.caption: Folder Reference
string.name: folder-ref

string.description: Folder Object id. Can be null if "folder" is set.
string.caption: Folder Id
string.name: folderId

integer.description: If "get" value is DESCENDANTS, represents the depth of the descendants tree.
integer.caption: Depth
integer.name: depth

string.description: Comma-separated list of properties to filter (only for CHILDREN or DESCENDANTS navigation).
string.caption: Filter
string.name: filter

string.description: Comma-separated list of query names and the ascending modifier "ASC" or the descending modifier "DESC" for each query name (only for CHILDREN or DESCENDANTS navigation).
string.caption: Order By
string.name: orderBy

string.description: The document from which to get the stream. Can be null if "objectId" is set.
string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.name: cmisObject-ref

string.description: Id of the document from which to get the stream. Can be null if "object" is set.
string.caption: Object Id
string.name: objectId

string.description: Id of the source folder.
string.caption: Source Folder Id
string.name: sourceFolderId

string.description: Id of the target folder.
string.caption: Target Folder Id
string.name: targetFolderId

string.description: The object to move. Can be null if "objectId" is set.
string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.name: cmisObject-ref

string.description: The object's id. Can be null if "cmisObject" is set.
string.caption: Object Id
string.name: objectId

string.description: Object to be updated. Can be null if "objectId" is set.
string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.name: cmisObject-ref

string.description: The object's id. Can be null if "cmisObject" is set.
string.caption: Object Id
string.name: objectId

string.description: The object whose relationships are needed.
string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.name: cmisObject-ref

string.description: The id of the object.
string.caption: Object Id
string.name: objectId

string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.name: cmisObject-ref

string.description: The id of the object.
string.caption: Object Id
string.name: objectId

string.name: document-ref

string.caption: Filter
string.name: filter

string.description: Comma-separated list of query names and the ascending modifier "ASC" or the descending modifier "DESC" for each query name (only for CHILDREN or DESCENDANTS navigation).
string.caption: Order By
string.name: orderBy

string.description: The document to be checked out. Can be null if "documentId" is set.
string.caption: Document Reference
string.name: document-ref

string.description: Id of the document to be checked out. Can be null if "document" is set.
string.caption: Document Id
string.name: documentId

string.description: The checked out document. Can be null if "documentId" is set.
string.caption: Document Reference
string.name: document-ref

string.description: Id of the checked out document. Can be null if "document" is set.
string.caption: Document Id
string.name: documentId

string.description: The document to check-in. Can be null if "documentId" is set.
string.caption: Document Reference
string.name: document-ref

string.description: Check-in comment.
string.caption: Checkin Comment
string.name: checkinComment

string.description: Id of the document to check-in. Can be null if "document" is set.
string.caption: Document Id
string.name: documentId

string.description: Name of the file.
string.caption: Filename
string.name: filename

enum.caption: Mime type
enum.description: The mime type, e.g. text/plain or application/json
enum.name: mimeType

string.description: The object whose Acl is intended to change.
string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.name: cmisObject-ref

string.description: The id of the object.
string.caption: Object Id
string.name: objectId

enum.description: Wheter to propagate changes or not. can be REPOSITORYDETERMINED | OBJECTONLY | PROPAGATE.
enum.caption: Acl Propagation
enum.name: aclPropagation

string.description: The document from which to get the stream. Can be null if "objectId" is set.
string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.name: cmisObject-ref

string.description: Id of the document from which to get the stream. Can be null if "object" is set.
string.caption: Object Id
string.name: objectId

string.description: The document from which to get the stream. Can be null if "objectId" is set.
string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.name: cmisObject-ref

string.description: Id of the document from which to get the stream. Can be null if "object" is set.
string.caption: Object Id
string.name: objectId

string.description: The object to be deleted. Can be null if "objectId" is set.
string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.name: cmisObject-ref

string.description: The object's id. Can be null if "cmisObject" is set.
string.caption: Object Id
string.name: objectId

boolean.description: If true, deletes all version history of the object. Defaults to "false".
boolean.caption: All Versions
boolean.name: allVersions

string.description: Folder Object. Can be null if "folderId" is set.
string.caption: Folder Reference
string.name: folder-ref

string.description: Folder Object id. Can be null if "folder" is set.
string.caption: Folder Id
string.name: folderId

enum.description: Specifies how the repository must process file-able child- or descendant-objects.
enum.caption: Unfile
enum.name: unfile

boolean.description: If true, then delete all versions of the document. If false, delete only the document object specified.
boolean.caption: Allversions
boolean.name: allversions

boolean.description: Specified whether to continue attempting to perform this operation even if deletion of a child- or descendant-object in the specified folder cannot be deleted or not.
boolean.caption: Continue On Failure
boolean.name: continueOnFailure
